snippet.title: Underdog Detective 神都不良探 - Trailer
snippet.description: Underdog Detective A full-video interactive video game made by 天津芸芸科技有限公司 in which you play as a detective and have to resolve multiple brain-burning plots. Explore from the first perspective and lead the plot trend at crucial nodes through various interactive forms such as choices, QTE, collecting clues and more.
